turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order some coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure I can help you with that. What location would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order from the 348 28th St SE, GrandRapids, MI 49506 locatio

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am trying to decide between a caffe latte or caffe mocha. Which has the most calories?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That caffe mocha is 360 calories and the caffe latte is 190 calories.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which one has the most caffeine?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The caffe mocha has the most.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I guess I will go with the caffe mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whip cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Why not. Iâ€™ll splurge.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Can I get you anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. That will be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How do you want to pay for it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have my card already on file.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so I have you ordering a grande caffe mocha with 2% milk and with whip cream from the 348 28th St SE Grand Rapids, MI 49506 location.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I have placed your order. I will send you a receipt via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
